Author: Rosenbluh J (2016)
Qualifications: High-credibility protein interactions were identified using draft-PPI and a method for protein interaction credibility scoring (ICS).

Author: Huttlin EL (2021)
Qualifications: BioPlex 3.0 HEK 293T cells CompPASS score = 0.964139004, threshold = 0.75. Quantitative scores are calculated by CompPASS-Plus (Huttlin et al. Cell 2015, PMID: 26186194). The 0.75 threshold represents the top 2% of scores in HEK293T.|This data may be re-scored from BioPlex 1.0 (PMID: 26186194) and BioPlex 2.0 (PMID: 28514442). Only scores from within the same cell line in BioPlex 3.0 (PMID: 33961781) should be compared directly. For comparison of HEK293T and HCT116 interaction networks with relaxed threshold = 0.1, see BioPlex Interactome (https://bioplex.hms.harvard.edu/index.php).
